text: Ndipo pamene musudzula akazi ndipo iwo akwanitsa nthawi yawo yodikira, asungeni mwaubwino kapena alekeni mwa mtendere. Koma musawasunge ndi cholinga chowazunza. Ndipo aliyense amene achita ichi, ndithudi adzilakwira yekha. Ndipo musachite chipongwe Mau a Mulungu koma kumbukirani madalitso a Mulungu kwa inu ndi zimene Iye watumiza mâ€™Buku ndi luntha limene Iye akulangizani inu. Muopeni Mulungu ndipo dziwani kuti Mulungu amadziwa chilichonse
